location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Crommelin, William Hornby, Daniel Draper, Rawson Hart Boddam, Benjamin Jervis, and Thomas Mostyn, President and Council at Bombay Castle, to William Bowyear and John Sebastian Natter, East India Company Resident and Factor at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter encloses copies of commands from the Court of Directors in London (not present) and two covenants (contract) to be signed by each servant at Bushire and returned to the Presidency. There are also instructions for the purchase of Carmenia wool.
